item.description:
The plan is to visit Russel Orchards, formerly, Goodale Farm in Ipswich. They are a farm and winery. We will walk around the farm and barns, maybe do some apple picking, pumpkin picking or wine sampling. Daisy Nell and Capt Stan are an awesome group. They play very New England-ish folk music.

Russel Farm also makes an unbelievable Apple Cider Dough Nut! I personally will be buying them by the dozen!

This is one of best working farms to visit. They have a friendly atmosphere.

Check out the farm's web page!
Russel Orchards

Ipswich has a Commuter Rail station so if you need a pick up please let me know.

Bring friends and stay as long as you like!

Cheers

Assistant Organizer Kyle
item.name: Russel Orchards with Music by Daisy Nell & Capt Stan
